column3:
Two kittens were playing. They had come in from outside. Now they were in the living room
ewlinein the house. One kitten was named Snowball and one kitten was named Fuzzy. Suddenly,
ewlineSnowball saw something interesting.
ewline
ewline"Look at that!" said Snowball.
ewline
ewline"What is it?" asked Fuzzy.
ewline
ewline"It's a ball of yarn. On the top shelf!" said Snowball. She had seen the yarn that was
ewlinekept in a basket up there!
ewline
ewline"That looks like it's fun to play with!" said Fuzzy. "But how could we get to it? It's so
ewlinehigh up," he wondered.
ewline
ewline"I have an idea," said Snowball. "Watch this!" Suddenly, Snowball jumped up on to the couch.
ewline
ewline"What are  you doing?" asked Fuzzy.
ewline
ewline"Just watch!" said Snowball. Snowball then jumped to the table next to the couch. Then,
ewlineshe jumped to the middle shelf.
ewline
ewline"That's dangerous!" said Fuzzy. Snowball and Fuzzy were still small kittens. They weren't
ewlineused to jumping very high yet.
ewline
ewline"Don't worry, I'll be careful. I think we're allowed to be up here." said Snowball. Then,
ewlineshe jumped all the way to the top shelf, where the yarn was. "Look out below!" she yelled,
ewlineand pushed the ball of yarn off the shelf and on to the floor.
ewline
ewline"Whoa!" said Fuzzy. "Thanks!" Snowball then jumped down to the middle shelf, and down to
ewlinethe table, and down to the couch, and back to the floor. There, she and her brother played
ewlinewith the ball of yarn until they got tired and took a nap.
column4: multiple: Why was it dangerous for Snowball to get the ball of yarn?
column5: Balls of yarn are dangerous for kittens to play with.
column7: She is not allowed to be on the shelf.
column8: She is still small, and wasn't used to jumping very high yet.
column9: multiple: Where were the kittens playing?
column10: In the living room in the house
column14: one: What did the kittens do after they finished playing with each other?
column19: multiple: Which kitten got the ball of yarn?
column22: A kitten that is not Fuzzy or Snowball.
column23: They got the ball of yarn together.
